nodes.text: Jake Blais is a producer and senior art director at LEGO. He worked as a producer on several LEGO Star Wars projects including the 2013–2014 animated series The Yoda Chronicles, the 2015 series Droid Tales, and the 2016 LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. He also worked on the visual effects of the short film The Incident at Tower 37.
